title: How To Waste $100 on Amazon...
description: With a $100 budget, Ken found some excellent 'tech' on Amazon. Naruto cosplay on Amazon...because reasons:  The $70 Doogee smartphone on Amazon:  Seedling Design Your Own Headphone kit on Amazon:  TRAKK Shell Bluetooth backpack on Amazon:  Sony W800 camera on Amazon:  A giant, expensive, dumb bearing on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:

No. (laughs) Hey, I'm glad I at least immediately recognized the knives. It's like, wait a minute. I used to want one of these when I was 13. (laughs) I feel like I'm in a GIF right now.
